00070 #ifndef _SHHANDLE_INCLUDED_
00071 #define _SHHANDLE_INCLUDED_
00072 
00073 //
00074 // Machine independent part of the compiler private objects
00075 // sent as ShHandle to the driver.
00076 //
00077 // This should not be included by driver code.
00078 //
00079 
00080 
00081 #define SH_EXPORTING   
00082 #include "../Public/HLSL2GLSL.h"
00083 
00084 #include "InfoSink.h"
00085 
00086 class TCompiler;
00087 class TLinker;
00088 
00089 
00090 //
00091 // The base class used to back handles returned to the driver.
00092 //
00093 class TShHandleBase
00094 {
00095 public:
00096    TShHandleBase() {}
00097    virtual ~TShHandleBase() {}
00098    virtual TCompiler* getAsCompiler() {   return 0; }
00099    virtual TLinker* getAsLinker() { return 0; }
00100    virtual const TCompiler* getAsCompiler() const { return 0; }
00101    virtual const TLinker* getAsLinker() const { return 0; }
00102 };
00103 
00104 class TIntermNode;
00105 
00106 //
00107 // The base class for the machine dependent compiler to derive from
00108 // for managing object code from the compile.
00109 //
00110 class TCompiler : public TShHandleBase
00111 {
00112 public:
00113    TCompiler(EShLanguage l, TInfoSink& sink) : infoSink(sink) , language(l), haveValidObjectCode(false)
00114    { }
00115    virtual ~TCompiler() { }
00116    EShLanguage getLanguage() { return language; }
00117    virtual TInfoSink& getInfoSink() { return infoSink; }
00118 
00119    virtual bool compile(TIntermNode* root) = 0;
00120 
00121    virtual TCompiler* getAsCompiler() { return this; }
00122    virtual const TCompiler* getAsCompiler() const { return this; }
00123    virtual bool linkable() { return haveValidObjectCode; }
00124 
00125    TInfoSink& infoSink;
00126 protected:
00127    EShLanguage language;
00128    bool haveValidObjectCode;
00129 };
00130 
00131 //
00132 // Link operations are base on a list of compile results...
00133 //
00134 typedef TVector<TCompiler*> TCompilerList;
00135 typedef TVector<TShHandleBase*> THandleList;
00136 
00137 //
00138 // The base class for the machine dependent linker to derive from
00139 // to manage the resulting executable.
00140 //
00141 
00142 class TLinker : public TShHandleBase
00143 {
00144 public:
00145    TLinker(TInfoSink& iSink) : 
00146       infoSink(iSink),
00147       haveReturnableObjectCode(false),      
00148       uniformBindings(0)
00149    {
00150    }
00151    virtual TLinker* getAsLinker() { return this; }
00152    virtual const TLinker* getAsLinker() const { return this; }
00153    virtual ~TLinker() { }
00154    virtual bool link(THandleList&, const char*, const char*) { return false; }
00155    virtual bool setUserAttribName ( EAttribSemantic eSemantic, const char *pName ) = 0;
00156    virtual void setUseUserVaryings ( bool bUseUserVaryings ) = 0;
00157    virtual bool setShaderHeader ( bool bOutputShaderHeader, const char *shaderHeaderString ) = 0;   
00158    virtual ShBindingTable* getUniformBindings() const { return uniformBindings; }
00159    virtual const void* getObjectCode() const { return 0; } // a real compiler would be returning object code here
00160    virtual TInfoSink& getInfoSink()
00161    {
00162       return infoSink;
00163    }
00164    TInfoSink& infoSink;
00165 
00166    virtual const char* getShaderText( EShLanguage lang) const = 0;
00167    virtual int getUniformCount() const = 0;
00168    virtual const ShUniformInfo* getUniformInfo() const = 0;
00169 
00170 protected:
00171    bool haveReturnableObjectCode;  // true when objectCode is acceptable to send to driver
00172 
00173    ShBindingTable* uniformBindings;                // created by the linker    
00174 };
00175 
00176 //
00177 // This is the interface between the machine independent code
00178 // and the machine dependent code.
00179 //
00180 // The machine dependent code should derive from the classes
00181 // above. Then Construct*() and Delete*() will create and 
00182 // destroy the machine dependent objects, which contain the
00183 // above machine independent information.
00184 //
00185 TCompiler* ConstructCompiler(EShLanguage, int);
00186 
00187 TShHandleBase* ConstructLinker(int);
00188 void DeleteLinker(TShHandleBase*);
00189 void DeleteCompiler(TCompiler*);
00190 
00191 
00192 #endif // _SHHANDLE_INCLUDED_
